replies.bodyText:
This collides with fullProfile

  
    
      jbpm/pom.xml
    
    
         Line 201
      in
      c5c9793
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <id>fullProfile</id> 
        
    
  



the full profile is generally used in all repositories where there is a need to differentiate something like basic + full (checks and distribution modules/release)
see https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/blob/master/pom.xml#L1791-L1797
so as you pointed below the release build use that too, so we need to keep or change a little bit the behavior for combined launching with full and not productized profile

For your information, jbpm-distribution is referenced by community (except jbpm) or production projects like this
./droolsjbpm-tools/drools-eclipse/org.jbpm.eclipse/plugin.xml:               url="http://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/groups/public-jboss/org/jbpm/jbpm-distribution/6.2.0.Final/jbpm-distribution-6.2.0.Final-bin.zip"
./droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/script/release/prepareUploadDir.sh:cp $deployDir/org/jbpm/jbpm-distribution/$kieVersion/jbpm-distribution-$kieVersion-bin.zip jbpm-$kieVersion-bin.zip
./droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/script/release/prepareUploadDir.sh:cp $deployDir/org/jbpm/jbpm-distribution/$kieVersion/jbpm-distribution-$kieVersion-examples.zip jbpm-$kieVersion-examples.zip

./rhba/rhpam/target/jbpm-installer-7.33.0-SNAPSHOT/build.properties:#   jBPM.url=https://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/groups/public-jboss/org/jbpm/jbpm-distribution/${jBPM.version}/jbpm-distribution-${jBPM.version}-bin.zip

I think we can delete the fullPorfile since we build it with productized profile and the ones from community are not relevant. WDYT?
Anyway it's much simpler solution than mine #1630
replies.author: mareknovotny
